entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 20 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Sunday 2 April 2023
